subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Patriots receiver Wes Welker, who shredded his left knee ligaments last year, is healthy for the playoffs this season, and the team and Tom Brady are thrilled to have him.
snippet: Patriots receiver Wes Welker, who shredded his left knee ligaments last year, is healthy for the playoffs this season, and the team and Tom Brady are thrilled to have him.
